Question: He is thoughtful and intelligent, but this person is constantly hindered by his own self-doubt, or by others tearing him down.
Hints: This person is drawn with only a small curl of hair at the front of his head, and a little in the back.
Charles "Charlie" this person is the main protagonist in the comic strip Peanuts by Charles M Schulz.
And in the TV special, Someday You'll Find Her, this person, Linus tells this person that he gets a new true love every week.
